OBJECTIVE 
To work in creative & challenging environment and achieve a growth-oriented career in an 
organization, where I could contribute to the growth of organization and utilize, enhance my 
technical skills, knowledge to the optimum. 
PROFESSIONAL SYNOPSYS 
 Presently associated with NET Enterprises as Sr. Engineer. 
 Worked at HCL services ltd. as a C.E. from July 2013 to June 2015. 
 Have experience of 22 months, in IT infrastructure. 
 Have experience of 3 years in CCTV infrastructure. 
 Currently giving CCTV infrastructure and network support to Indo Gulf Fertilizer (ABG Group). 
 Have good knowledge of RF, Fiber, LAN network troubleshooting. 
 Have good knowledge of troubleshooting PCs, laptops hardware and software. 
 Proficiency in troubleshooting and maintaining CCTV and IT infrastructure 
 Good knowledge of wireless networking devices such as Wi-Fi radio (5 & 2.4 GHz). 
 Proficiency in installation and troubleshooting of Analog and IP Camera setup. 
 Knowledge of Networking, TCP/IP, DHCP, LAN Troubleshooting, 
 Knowledge of Windows hardware and Software troubleshooting. 
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 Troubleshooting of Network and Hardware problem in given time frame. 
 Provide CCTV infrastructure, hardware and its Network support. 
 Maintain setup of IT assets. 
 Do system up-gradation timely. 
 Maintain and monitor the setup. 
 Assisted company personnel with desktop operation both hardware and software related issue. 
 Supervised and performed the installation of new IT network equipment, system software and 
desktop computer. 
 Maintain the network to its best form so that it can run smoothly. 
EXPERIENCE 
 Worked at NCL (Northern coalfield ltd.) for anti-virus installation project, software installed in 786 
PCs and 15 Servers within the time limits.

 Worked at Hindalco Ind. Ltd. (ABG group) Renukoot for 1 month. 
 Worked at Mahan Alluminium Ltd. (ABG group) M.P. for 14 month. 
 Currently working at NET Enterprises, Lucknow as a Site engineer.
